main.name: Ahmed Raza
main.description: Focused on enhancing product quality and ensuring process control in the textile sector.
main.bio: I am Ahmed Raza, a highly motivated professional with 2+ years of experience in process control, dyeing planning, and production costing within the textile industry. I aim to enhance operational efficiency, reduce rework, and promote continuous improvement in manufacturing processes.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch for professional inquiries, collaboration, or mentorship.

resume.skillmessage: A diverse skillset ranging from quality control to frontend development and design.

education.school: Academy of Islamic and Modern Studies 2003-2015
education.description: Strong foundation in analytical and industrial chemistry with hands-on lab training.

work.title: Sales Supervisor
work.description: Worked closely with management to achieve sales targets, analyze sales data, manage accounts, and create reports.

work.title: Intern - Quality Department
work.description: Performed quality tests (FFA, Soap Content, M&I, SMP, FAME, POV, Citric Acid) on edible oil products, ensuring adherence to food safety standards. Conducted Line and Packaging Quality Departure Inspections. Collaborated with QA team to document findings.

work.title: MTO - Quality Control
work.description: Optimized dyeing performance by analyzing real-time data. Conducted quality control tests (Formic Acid, Acetic Acid, Caustic Soda purity; absorbency and solid content analysis), ensuring 100% compliance with industry standards.

work.title: Assistant Manager - Processing
work.description: Managed production costing for dyeing operations. Planned and scheduled dyeing operations, ensuring on-time delivery. Created comprehensive production performance reports.

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.category: E-commerce interface clone built with React.js

projects.title: LinkedIn Clone
projects.category: LinkedIn UI clone with React & Redux

testimonials.text: Ahmed has consistently demonstrated strong analytical skills and attention to detail in quality control processes.
His contribution to dyeing planning helped optimize resource allocation and improve on-time delivery rates.
He proactively identified process gaps and suggested lean improvements that saved time and reduced waste.
Ahmed’s skills in Excel dashboards enhanced data visibility and helped streamline decision-making in production meetings.
His commitment to continuous improvement and learning new tools made him a valuable member of our process control team.
Ahmed consistently delivers quality work and is very detail-oriented.
His skills in both QA and frontend development make him a valuable asset.
